hierarchy.entry_domain: NIST SP 800-53 Security and Privacy Controls

active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate the trade-offs between strict media access controls (per NIST MP-2) and employee productivity in a hybrid work environment. Provide examples of digital vs. non-digital media risks, such as lost USB drives vs. misplaced paper documents containing CUI.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
